DOC.brief_title: Gastrointestinal Tolerability Study Of Dimethyl Fumarate ( DMF ) In Participants With Relapsing-Remitting Multiple Sclerosis In Germany
DOC.criteria: Key Have confirm diagnosis relapsingremitting multiple sclerosis ( RRMS ) accord current McDonald Criteria satisfy therapeutic indication describe official local registration Tecfidera ( dimethyl fumarate ) . Naïve dimethyl fumarate ( DMF ) fumaric acid ester .
